scripts.dev: npm run backend:serve & npm run frontend:dev
scripts.build: npm run backend:build & npm run frontend:build
scripts.lint: npm run backend:lint && npm run frontend:lint
scripts.update-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),v=process.env.VERSION;if(!v)throw new Error('VERSION env required');const cleanVersion=v.replace(/^v/, '');['./package.json','./apps/backend/package.json','./apps/frontend/package.json'].forEach(f=>{if(fs.existsSync(f)){const content=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');const p=JSON.parse(content);p.version=cleanVersion;fs.writeFileSync(f,JSON.stringify(p,null,2));}});console.log('Updated to',cleanVersion)" && npm install --package-lock-only --silent
